title: [PERF] Implement proper database connection pooling
body:
## Problem
Database connections not properly pooled, causing performance issues.

## Tasks
- [ ] Configure SQLAlchemy connection pool
- [ ] Add connection monitoring
- [ ] Implement connection recycling
- [ ] Add performance tests
- [ ] Document configuration

## Acceptance Criteria
- Connection pool configured
- Performance improved by 20%+
- No connection leaks
- Monitoring in place

## Priority: MEDIUM
## Effort: 5 story points
